comments:
1. Create a Java project(JavaUtil)
2. Create a  standalone  Web Project
3. From the Web project->Properties->Java Jar Depenedencies, select JavaUtil,
4. Modify .wtpmodules  of the Web project  so that  deploy path is  /WEB-
INF/lib

 <dependent-module deploy-path="/WEB-INF/lib"   
handle="module:/resource/JavaUtil/JavaUtil">
            <dependency-type>uses</dependency-type>
        </dependent-module>

5. Build the Web project
6. Now try to  export, you will see the following error.
